plot: Bouboule is the happiest dog ever owned by the scientist Kodok and his wife until he meets Serpentin. The latter is shooting a film. He is looking for a dog to star in it. Bouboule is hired...
title: Serpentin a dressé Bouboule
plot_es: Bouboule is the happiest dog ever owned by the scientist Kodok and his wife until he meets Serpentin. The latter is shooting a film. He is looking for a dog to star in it. Bouboule is hired...
plot_en: Bouboule is the happiest dog ever owned by the scientist Kodok and his wife until he meets Serpentin. The latter is shooting a film. He is looking for a dog to star in it. Bouboule is hired...
